title: YouTube : most viewed movie trailers 2014
yAxis: Number of YouTube views in millions
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Movie, and a y axis representing Number of YouTube views in millions.
The highest category is found at Fifty_Shades_Of_Grey_-_Official_Trailer_(Universal_Pictures)_HD where Number of YouTube views in millions is 67.0.
The lowest category is found at Official_Call_of_Duty:_Advanced_Warfare_Reveal_Trailer where Number of YouTube views in millions is 26.0.
